scripts.deploy-prod: REACT_APP_BASE_URL='https://findmyclub.nyu.edu' react-scripts build && aws s3 cp build s3://findmyclub-prod-frontend/ --recursive --profile stit
scripts.deploy-dev: REACT_APP_BASE_URL='https://dev.findmyclub.nyu.edu' react-scripts build && aws s3 cp build s3://findmyclub-dev-frontend/ --recursive --profile stit
scripts.deploy-both: npm run deploy-dev && npm run deploy-prod
